name: tg-profile-engine
description: Local Telegram chat analysis: ontology-lite knowledge graph with evidence-gated inference.

scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d postgres && sleep 2 && docker compose run --rm dbmate up
scripts.run-sql: docker compose exec -e PGPASSWORD=tgprofile postgres psql -U tgprofile -d tgprofile -c
scripts.pipeline: npm run build && npm run bulk-ingest && npm run compute-features && npm run enrich-psycho && npm run export-viewer
